short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Starcoin Wallet in your Browser
short.fr: Un wallet Starcoin dans votre navigateur

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StarMask is an extension for accessing Starcoin/Aptos enabled distributed applications,  or "Dapps" in your normal Chrome browser!

StarMask also lets the user create and manage their own identities, then user can send STC/APT between their accounts.

The extension injects the web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from the blockchains.
long.fr:
StarMask is an extension for accessing Starcoin enabled distributed applications,  or "Dapps" in your normal Chrome browser!

StarMask also lets the user create and manage their own identities, then user can send STC between their accounts.

The extension injects the web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from the blockchain.
long.zh_CN:
StarMask is an extension for accessing Starcoin enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps" in your normal Chrome browser!

The extension injects the web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that Dapps can read from the blockchain.

StarMask also lets the user create and manage their own identities, so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, StarMask requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always "view the source" of StarMask the way you do any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github:
https://github.com/starcoinorg/starmask-extension
